widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (300, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (310, 1), size = (250, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (570, 1), size = (300, 40), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (900, 1), size = (500, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("torrentPlayerFont", 35),gFont("torrentPlayerFont", 30)], "itemHeight": 48 }
